message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm a bit tight on budget, but I think the product would be a great addition to my collection.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $14,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. Can you consider that?
